alert.note: Alert for Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 16 at 1:39PM EST until November 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. The heaviest snow will occur tonight into early Thursday morning over far western Wyoming county. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Wyoming county. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4261 7809 4270 7817 4281 7833 4276 7900 4234 7970 4227 7975 4235 7933 4250 7904 4255 7864 4256 7828 TIME Y22M11D17T0000Z-Y22M11D17T0600Z COORD...4249 7844 4266 7836 4271 7844 4272 7888 4259 7911 4243 7955 4232 7975 4203 7976 4214 7948 4224 7905 TIME Y22M11D17T0600Z-Y22M11D17T1800Z COORD...4298 7836 4308 7847 4307 7883 4300 7898 4281 7890 4255 7936 4261 7908 4267 7898 4273 7870 4282 7848 TIME Y22M11D18T1200Z-Y22M11D19T1200Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
